description: Four-week progression focusing on jazz comping skills

sessions.title: Week 1: Basic Shell Voicings
sessions.description: Learn and practice basic shell voicings (3rds and 7ths) in all keys.

tasks.name: Shell Voicings Practice
tasks.teacherNotes: Focus on clean shell voicings (3rds and 7ths) in all keys. Practice ii-V-I progressions in C, F, Bb, Eb. Use metronome at 80 BPM.

tasks.name: Autumn Leaves - Shell Voicings
tasks.teacherNotes: Apply shell voicings to Autumn Leaves. Focus on smooth voice leading between chords.

sessions.title: Week 2: Drop 2 Voicings
sessions.description: Learn drop 2 voicings for major 7th, minor 7th, and dominant 7th chords.

tasks.name: Drop 2 Voicings Practice
tasks.teacherNotes: Learn drop 2 voicings for major 7th, minor 7th, and dominant 7th chords. Practice in all 12 keys. Focus on smooth voice leading between chords.

tasks.name: Autumn Leaves - Drop 2 Voicings
tasks.teacherNotes: Apply drop 2 voicings to Autumn Leaves. Compare with shell voicings from last week.

sessions.title: Week 3: Rhythmic Patterns
sessions.description: Work on jazz comping rhythms: Charleston pattern, dotted quarter notes, syncopated patterns.

tasks.name: Rhythmic Patterns Practice
tasks.teacherNotes: Work on jazz comping rhythms: Charleston pattern, dotted quarter notes, syncopated patterns. Practice with backing tracks.

tasks.name: All The Things You Are - Rhythm Practice
tasks.teacherNotes: Apply rhythmic patterns to All The Things You Are. Focus on groove and feel.

sessions.title: Week 4: Advanced Voice Leading
sessions.description: Practice chromatic voice leading, passing chords, and reharmonization techniques.

tasks.name: Advanced Voice Leading Practice
tasks.teacherNotes: Practice chromatic voice leading, passing chords, and reharmonization techniques.

tasks.name: Stella By Starlight - Advanced Voicings
tasks.teacherNotes: Apply advanced voicings to Stella By Starlight. Record a complete performance.
